realtime_memories.content: User preference: Be extremely clear and explicit about what actions the user needs to take. Don't assume context — state clearly if no action is needed. User prefers directness over hedging. User wants parallel agent swarms for multi-page reviews.

Architecture: Frontend (Vite/React) on port 5173, Backend (FastAPI/uvicorn) on port 8000. Frontend API config: src/lib/config.ts appends /api/v1 to base URL (VITE_API_URL). Property detail subpages are tabs within /properties/:id (not separate routes) — accessed via 'View Full Details' from /investments. Standalone Transactions page REMOVED (merged into Investments property detail Transactions tab).

Extraction pipeline: 28 Excel files -> 26 properties (30 seeded), 30,394 values across 11 categories. Data quality issues: many properties have 300-600+ errors out of 1,169 fields. LEVERED/UNLEVERED IRR/MOIC extraction cells return NULL for all 88 properties — LP_RETURNS_IRR/MOIC used as fallback (IRR 0.12-0.23). BASIS_UNIT_AT_EXIT only 11/88 have values. Real estate taxes for some properties exceed gross revenue — extraction mapping error. effectiveGrossIncome extraction returns null for all properties.

Key type changes (property.ts): performance uses leveredIrr/leveredMoic/unleveredIrr(nullable)/unleveredMoic(nullable). operations.expenses is object with 12 named categories + total. acquisition has 6 budget category fields. operationsByYear: OperatingYear[] with OperatingYearExpenses and 9 additional fields (lossToLease, badDebts, otherLoss, laundryIncome, parkingIncome, petIncome, storageIncome, utilityIncome, otherMiscIncome, effectiveGrossIncome). totalBasisPerUnitExit and seniorLoanBasisPerUnitExit are number|null.

CHECKPOINT Feb 3 2026 — ALL Investments + Transactions + Deals tasks COMPLETE (Tasks 12-17):

[Task 12] FinancialsTab: Removed 'Purchase Price' and 'Land and Acquisition Costs' from Acquisition Details to fix double-counting.

[Task 13] OperationsTab complete rewrite: Added 9 missing line items to full pipeline (seed_database.py -> properties.py _build_operations_by_year -> property.ts OperatingYear -> OperationsTab.tsx). Revenue/loss section: Loss to Lease, Vacancy Loss, Bad Debts, Concessions, Other Loss. Other Income breakdown: Laundry, Parking, Pet, Storage, Utility, Other Misc. Effective Gross Income subtotal. Improved pie chart: donut style with Legend, paddingAngle, white stroke, shadow tooltip. CashflowRow skips all-zero rows. Expense total calculated from individual line items.

[Task 14] Performance metrics fixed: Backend fallback logic (leveredIrr = ret.leveredIrr or ret.lpIrr) now working after re-seed. API returns leveredIrr=0.1704, leveredMoic=1.8029, totalBasisPerUnitExit=24.0, seniorLoanBasisPerUnitExit=12.0. unleveredIrr/Moic remain null (no extraction data).

[Task 15] Standalone Transactions page removed: Deleted /transactions route from router.tsx, routes.ts, Sidebar.tsx, GlobalSearch.tsx. Property-detail TransactionsTab remains.

[Task 16] Deals Timeline cards updated with 9 new metrics: Unit Count, Avg Unit SF, Current Owner, Last Sale $/Unit, Last Sale Date, T12 Return-on-Cost, Levered IRR, Levered MOIC, Total Equity Commitment, Deal Value. Backend enrichment: _enrich_deals_with_extraction() in deals.py queries extracted_values + property financial_data. New fields on DealResponse schema. Both /deals/ and /deals/kanban endpoints enriched. 25/30 deals have extraction data.

[Task 17] Deal stages changed from 7 old stages (lead/underwriting/loi/due_diligence/closing/closed_won/closed_lost) to 6 SharePoint stages: dead, initial_review, active_review, under_contract, closed, realized. Labels: Dead Deals, Initial UW and Review, Active UW and Review, Deals Under Contract, Closed Deals, Realized Deals. Updated: deal.ts types/labels/colors, api.ts DealStageApi, useDeals.ts mapBackendStage, DealFilters, DealPipeline, KanbanBoard, KanbanBoardWidget, KanbanColumn, DealCard, DealDetailModal. Removed all 'Closed Lost' sections. Fixed metric cards to compute from filteredDeals (not unfiltered).

Files modified in this session:
- backend/app/api/v1/endpoints/deals.py (added _enrich_deals_with_extraction, enriched list+kanban endpoints)
- backend/app/schemas/deal.py (added 9 enrichment fields to DealResponse)
- backend/scripts/seed_database.py (added 9 operationsByYear fields)
- backend/app/api/v1/endpoints/properties.py (updated _build_operations_by_year with new fields)
- src/types/deal.ts (new 6-stage DealStage, new Deal fields, updated labels/colors)
- src/types/api.ts (new DealStageApi matching 6 stages)
- src/types/property.ts (added 9 fields to OperatingYear)
- src/hooks/api/useDeals.ts (new stage mapping, new BackendDealResponse fields, updated transform)
- src/features/deals/hooks/useDeals.ts (new stage grouping, fixed metrics from filteredDeals)
- src/features/deals/components/DealTimeline.tsx (complete rewrite with 9 metrics)
- src/features/deals/components/DealFilters.tsx (new 6 stages)
- src/features/deals/components/DealPipeline.tsx (new stages, removed closed_lost section)
- src/features/deals/components/KanbanBoard.tsx (new stages, removed closed_lost)
- src/features/deals/components/KanbanBoardWidget.tsx (new stages, removed closed_lost)
- src/features/deals/components/KanbanColumn.tsx (new stage icons/colors)
- src/features/deals/components/DealCard.tsx (new stage progress)
- src/features/deals/components/DealDetailModal.tsx (new stage colors)
- src/features/property-detail/components/FinancialsTab.tsx (removed Purchase Price, Land and Acquisition Costs)
- src/features/property-detail/components/OperationsTab.tsx (complete rewrite)
- src/app/router.tsx (removed TransactionsPage route)
- src/app/routes.ts (removed TransactionsPage lazy import, TRANSACTIONS route)
- src/app/layout/Sidebar.tsx (removed Transactions nav item)
- src/components/GlobalSearch.tsx (removed Transactions search entry)

Next pages to review: Analytics, Market, Mapping, Dashboard.

The checkpoint has been saved. Here's where things stand:

**All Tasks 12-17: COMPLETE**
- Task 12: FinancialsTab double-counting fix
- Task 13: OperationsTab rewrite with 9 new line items
- Task 14:

Can you please run a git commit/push command. Once you finish with that can you please produce easy to use instructions for restoring our latest conversation so we can pick up with the remaining dashb
